text: This article lists census-designated places (CDPs) in the U.S. state of Louisiana. As of the 2020 census, there were a total of 184 census-designated places in Louisiana. == Census-designated places == CDP Population Parish Ama 1,290 St. Charles Amelia 2,132 St. Mary Arabi 4,533 St.
